title: Fox's top lawyer exiting company months after $787.5M Dominion settlement
description: Viet Dinh, Fox's chief legal and policy officer, plans to step down from his role at the end of the year and become a special adviser to the company, Fox said.

title: YouTube channel bridges gap between underground and mainstream hip-hop artists
description: YouTube channel "On The Radar" provides a platform for underground and mainstream hip-hop artists to show their freestyle talent. NBC News' Maya Eaglin talks to the channel's CEO Gabe P about why it's important for him to build this platform to bridge the gap.

title: Distrustful Republicans rip Hunter Biden special counsel appointment
description: House and Senate Republicans ripped Attorney General Merrick Garland’s decision to appoint a special counsel in the Hunter Biden probe.

title: Who is David Weiss, the newly appointed Hunter Biden special counsel?
description: Attorney General Merrick Garland said Friday that David Weiss would be appointed as special counsel for the Hunter Biden probe.

title: Hawaii governor says residents will be able to return to Lahaina today
description: Hawaii governor says residents will be able to return to Lahaina today

title: Photos: Wildfires rip through Maui, killing at least 55 and destroying historic town
description: Images from Maui show the extent of the Hawaiian wildfires, the damage caused by the blazes and how residents are responding to the disaster in Lahaina and beyond.

title: From 1996: Meet the man who invented a wearable computer
description: Steve Mann had a bold vision: One day we might wear computers on our heads. “Somebody’s got to explore the future,” he said. NBC’s Mike Leonard reports for TODAY back on Feb. 15, 1996.

title: AG Merrick Garland appoints a special counsel in Hunter Biden probe
description: Attorney General Merrick Garland announced a special counsel will be appointed in the ongoing probe of the president's son, Hunter Biden.

title: Lahaina banyan tree emerges as charred but still standing in sign of hope, locals say
description: A large banyan tree in the heart of Old Lahaina that was badly scorched by the fires that ransacked Maui appears to have emerged from the flames still standing.

title: Why a special counsel was appointed in the Hunter Biden investigation
description: Attorney General Merrick Garland announced that U.S. Attorney David Weiss has been appointed as special counsel to investigate Hunter Biden. NBC News’ Kelly O’Donnell explains why it’s important for the investigation into President Biden’s son to be independent of the Department of Justice.

title: Family of Henrietta Lacks files new lawsuit over cells harvested without her consent
description: A week after Henrietta Lacks’ descendants have filed another claim against a different corporation accused of unjustly profiting off her cells for generations.

title: Death toll climbs to 55 in Maui fires as focus shifts to search and rescue
Man mourns 'toughest loss' of his father's ashes in Maui wildfire
description: A man is mourning the loss of his father's ashes in the devastating Maui wildfires. Kimo Kirkman said the were lost in the Lahaina blaze.

title: Biden attorneys in talks with federal prosecutors over terms of his interview in classified documents case
description: Special Counsel Robert Hur was appointed by Attorney General Merrick Garland to investigate Biden's handling of classified documents after his term as vice president ended.

title: Maui County mayor on devastating fires: ‘We will rebuild’
description: Richard Bissen, the mayor of Maui County in Hawaii, joins TODAY and opens up about the devastating wildfires that have left at least 55 people dead and their plans to rebuild. “Right now, our focus is on finding any missing persons. We want to reunite families,” he says.

title: Cruise, Waymo approved to operate robotaxi services in San Francisco despite safety concerns
description: California regulators approved an expansion that will allow two rival robotaxi services to operate throughout San Francisco at all hours, despite safety worries.

title: Emergency doctor describes treating Maui fire victims in shelters
description: During the Maui fires, a doctor drove his mobile clinic to Lahaina to triage evacuees and treat people with health issues related to burns, smoke, asthma and stress.

title: Maui residents escaped wildfires with little more than their lives
description: Many Maui residents escaped the wildfires with little more than their lives and waited for word about their missing loved ones.
